vision.notes: Likely present, given that Sepiolidae are cephalopods and most cephalopods have complex eyes. Further data needed to confirm visual acuity and spectral sensitivity.

mechanoreception.notes: Likely present; used for detecting water currents and vibrations. Important for prey detection and predator avoidance.

chemoreception.notes: Likely present; used for detecting chemical cues in the water. Important for finding prey and mates.
